archimate:Capability.name: Abstraction, Query, Retrieval and Data Presentation
archimate:Capability.documentation: Generally referred to as the Semantic Layer within COTS toolsets e.g. SAP BusinessObjects Universes, IBM Cognos Framework Manager Packages, Power BI Content Packs, etc. This abstracts the logical business definition from the technical location of the data and presents the logical view of the data to the consumer. Facilitates the provision of a single reporting layer from multiple federated sources. This layer also allows for harmonised and approved business rules to be presented as consistent measures.
